packets.name: Drag Effect
packets.description: Displays a drag/drop visual effect between two points.

packets.name: Lift Reject
packets.description: Server rejects a lift/pick up request.

values.name: Try To Steal
values.description: That does not belong to you

values.name: Are Holding
values.description: You are already holding an item

packets.name: Death Status
packets.description: Notifies client of death/resurrection state.

packets.name: Pathfind Message
packets.description: Instructs client to pathfind to a location.

packets.name: Skills Update
packets.description: Sends full skills list or single skill update to client.

related.note: Change Skill Lock may trigger update

packets.name: Current Time
packets.description: Sends current server time to client.

packets.name: Weather
packets.description: Sets weather conditions for client.

packets.name: Play Music
packets.description: Plays background music on client.

packets.name: Ping Ack
packets.description: Server acknowledges ping request.

packets.name: Server Change
packets.description: Notifies client of server/map transition.

packets.name: Sequence
packets.description: Sends sequence number to client for synchronization.

packets.name: Display Paperdoll
packets.description: Opens paperdoll window for a mobile.

packets.name: Display Hue Picker
packets.description: Opens hue picker dialog on client.

fields.name: Item ID
fields.description: Item graphic to preview hue on

packets.name: Launch Browser
packets.description: Opens a URL in client's web browser.

packets.name: Scroll Message
packets.description: Displays a scrollable tips/message window.

packets.name: Display Profile
packets.description: Displays a mobile's profile.

packets.name: Season Change
packets.description: Changes the visual season on client.

packets.name: Extended Status
packets.description: Multi-purpose status packet. The Type byte determines the payload: Type 0 for pet bonded status, Type 2/5 for player stat locks.

variants.name: Bonded Status (Type 0)

fields.name: Bonded
fields.description: True if pet is bonded to owner

variants.notes: Sent when a pet's bonded status changes or when pet info is requested.

variants.name: Stat Lock Info - Enhanced (Type 5)
variants.notes: Enhanced Client uses Type 5 instead of Type 2

packets.notes: The Type byte after the sub-command determines the packet structure. Type 0 is for pet bonding, Types 2/5 are for player stat locks (Classic/Enhanced Client respectively).

packets.name: Change Update Range
packets.description: Sets the client's update range.

packets.name: Logout Ack
packets.description: Server acknowledges logout request.
